meta.name: content-research-writer
meta.title: Content Research Writer
meta.description: Assists in writing high-quality content by conducting research, adding citations, improving hooks, iterating on outlines, and providing real-time feedback on each section

original_definition.skill_description: Assists in writing high-quality content by conducting research, adding citations, improving hooks, iterating on outlines, and providing real-time feedback on each section. Transforms your writing process from solo effort to collaborative partnership.

actions.name: Understand Writing Project
actions.description: Gather topic, audience, length, format, goal, and style preferences

actions.name: Create Collaborative Outline
actions.description: Structure content into hook, intro, main sections, conclusion, with research needs marked

actions.name: Conduct Research
actions.description: Search for relevant information and credible sources

actions.name: Improve Hook
actions.description: Analyze and strengthen opening with alternative options

actions.name: Provide Section Feedback
actions.description: Review section for clarity, flow, evidence, style with specific suggestions

actions.name: Manage Citations
actions.description: Add and format references in requested citation style

actions.name: Final Review and Polish
actions.description: Comprehensive review for structure, flow, content quality, readability

rules.name: Validate Topic Defined
rules.condition_expression: Topic and main argument are defined

directives.name: Content Draft Complete
directives.description: Full draft with research, citations, and polish

directives.name: Voice Preservation Principle
directives.description: Suggest don't replace, match tone, respect choices, enhance don't override

directives.name: Feedback Structure
directives.description: What Works Well, Suggestions (Clarity, Flow, Evidence, Style), Specific Line Edits, Questions to Consider

execution_paths.expected_outcome: Detailed section feedback with line edits
